title: Locomotion Animations
description: True first person and third person, Parcour, locomotion, weapon animations
longDescription:
Showcase https://youtu.be/zWzPodi_DsM

Feature Talk https://youtu.be/XzsscDsqVK0




Both True First person and Third person animations are included ( some animations work with Both)

For movement and Idle Poses there is an Additive breath animation - Allowing you to implement an increased and decreased breathing speed

most weapon targets


Total 581 animations Sequence

100 anim Montage

35 Blend space

35 aim offset

7 Blend space


Weapon animation

Idle

Equip

chamber


Character animations All for First person and Third Person animations

Rifle

handgun

Shotgun

Rocket Launcher

2 handed Melee

one handed Melee

throw




Fire, reload, Bolt and Pump all have Hip and ADS versions


Movement root motion

Downed/Knocked Crawl

Glider

Inject Self

Slide

Monkey Bar

Wall Hang

ledge Hang

Climb up

climb on to

Jump on top

Rope Horizontal

Rope Vertical

Ladder

Vault


Turn in place

Version 5.4 has

Crouch - 8 Direction Root Motion Third Person

Walk- 8 direction First person 8 Direction Root Motion Third Person

Run - 8 direction First person 8 Direction Root Motion Third Person

Pivot animations 8 directions first person and third person for walk and run


5.3 has

4 direction walk run for first person 8direction third person



The legacy inplace walk run and crouch will remain in place (4 direction movement) ( 8for third person)

But they will be removed in the next update due to the changes in the 5.4+ engine


Important Notice Regarding Animation Asset Pack:

This asset pack provides animation sequence only and does not include logic for controlling those animations. Please refrain from purchasing this pack if you require complete animation Blueprint logic encompassing all functionalities.

Should you require assistance in implementing animation logic, please refer to the pinned resources within the support channel to existing training resources from multiple resources.
